comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Edward Cunningham "Eddie" Foster (February 13, 1887 in Chicago, Illinois - January 15, 1937 in Washington, D.C.), is a former professional baseball player who played third base in the Major Leagues from 1910-1923. He would play for the New York Yankees, Washington Senators, Boston Red Sox, and St. Louis Browns. Need to fix the tense there...
